ValidationRule.description: Stage cannot be marked won unless there is an estimate amount or a billing forecast entered.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISNULL(Amount__c), NOT(Total_Billing_Forecast_Amount__c>0)) && ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Won') && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Emergency Svces')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Consulting')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Marketing')) && DATEVALUE(Date_Time_Taken__c)>= DATE(2017,05,05), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter an estimate amount and a billing forecast for this job before marking this won. Both MUST be entered!
